title: Are We in a New RPG Golden Age? | Slightly Something Else
description:
This week on Slightly Something Else, we say goodbye to our Managing Editor, John Friscia, by talking all about RPGs and if we're in a new Golden Age for the genre.

title: Is Infinite Guitars a Hidden Gem?
description:
Each week KC and Jesse check out an overlooked game on Steam and decide whether or not it's a "Hidden Gem". This week they're checking out Infinite Guitars.
